statements: UPDATE secure_communication SET client_name='Alice', ssl_enabled=true WHERE id=1;

UPDATE secure_communication SET client_name='Client A', port_number=443, ssl_enabled=true WHERE id=1;
UPDATE secure_communication SET ip_address='192.168.1.10', port_number=80, ssl_enabled=false, client_name='Client B' WHERE id=2;
